ch0302_00_chiri/0101_0701_01_10: Hey hey! Rika here, at your service!
ch0302_00_chiri/0101_0701_02_10:
How’ve you been, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
Go get ’em out there today!
ch0302_00_chiri/7101_0701_01_10:
Lotta people on this island are pretty easy to talk
to—just like good ol’ Rika here!
ch0302_00_chiri/7101_0701_02_10:
Sure is nice to be somewhere I can relax,
be myself, and just vibe with folks.
ch0302_00_chiri/7102_0701_01_10:
I conduct interviews for the Pokémon League in
Paldea, so I’m confident in my ability to assess
people.
ch0302_00_chiri/7102_0701_02_10:
In fact, a quick look is all I need to know exactly
what kinda person you are!
ch0302_00_chiri/7102_0701_03_10:
Don’t even need to talk to you, really. I can more
or less tell what’s going on in that head of yours...
ch0302_00_chiri/7102_0701_04_10:
So if you’ve got something on your mind, don’t try
hiding it—l’ll see right through you!
ch0302_00_chiri/7103_0701_01_10:
So, Paldea’s Elite Four... We’re a bunch of pretty
quirky individuals. A real cast of characters, you
could say.
ch0302_00_chiri/7103_0701_02_10: What, you don’t believe me? It’s totally true!
ch0302_00_chiri/7103_0701_03_10:
I mean, c’mon, I’M the one who keeps ’em all in
line—ME! Can you believe that?
ch0302_00_chiri/7104_0701_01_10:
Y’know, I’m a pretty serious person. I’ve got work
on the mind all the time.
ch0302_00_chiri/7104_0701_02_10:
Seriously, I’ve even been asking around about
what the Pokémon Leagues in other regions
are like...
ch0302_00_chiri/7104_0701_03_10:
With any luck, I can use what I learn to make
the Paldea League even more interesting!
ch0302_00_chiri/7105_0701_01_10:
You’re gonna learn and grow so much more,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]. I can just tell.
ch0302_00_chiri/7105_0701_02_10:
After all, I personally witnessed the very moment
a kid about your age in Paldea reached their true
potential.
ch0302_00_chiri/7105_0701_03_10:
Keep working hard so your rivals don’t leave you
in the dust, all right?
ch0302_00_chiri/1701_0701_01_10: Here’s a present for you for working so hard.
ch0302_00_chiri/1701_0702_01_10:
I hope that present helps you keep up the
good work!
ch0302_00_chiri/2501_0701_01_10:
Now, I’d like to ask you a question, if you
wouldn’t mind.
ch0302_00_chiri/2501_0701_02_10:
What do you intend to do if and when you
become stronger?
ch0302_00_chiri/2501_0701_03_10: ...That’s me in work mode! Whaddya think?
ch0302_00_chiri/2501_0702_01_10:
If you ever take on the Paldea Pokémon League
yourself...
ch0302_00_chiri/2501_0702_02_10: you just might get to see my work mode in person!
ch0302_00_chiri/2511_0701_01_10:
I’m the first of the Elite Four that challengers
square up against in the Paldea Pokémon League.
ch0302_00_chiri/2511_0701_02_10: But most of ’em never make it past me.
ch0302_00_chiri/2511_0701_03_10:
Real shame. Every last one of them has real
passion and serious talent...
ch0302_00_chiri/2511_0702_01_10:
Nobody should feel like they have to drop out just 
because they lose. I want ’em to come back and
face me as many times as it takes ’em to win!
ch0302_00_chiri/2511_0702_02_10:
But even if they beat me, they’ve got even more
formidable folks to face afterward—including our
fearless commander herself.
ch0302_00_chiri/2511_0702_03_10:
Heh, I bet you’d be surprised by who shows up
second!
ch0302_00_chiri/3001_0701_01_10: Mornin’! Kiddos like you should stay sharp!
ch0302_00_chiri/3003_0701_01_10: You’ve still got half the day left, so hang in there!
ch0302_00_chiri/3005_0701_01_10:
Well done today. Let’s rest up and give it our all
again tomorrow.
